scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Groups_MembersList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('isinsidebar.vm') #set($view = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('viewType', 'simple')) #if ($isInSidebar || $view != 'full') #if($view == 'simple') #set($listUrl = 'avatar-list.vm') $core_v2_ui.PagedContent('avatar-list.vm') #else #set($listUrl = 'simple-list.vm') $core_v2_ui.PagedContent('simple-list.vm') #end #if($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('enablePaging', true)) $core_v2_ui.Pager($members.PageIndex, $members.PageSize, $members.TotalCount, "%{ShowIndividualPages = 'false', ShowPrevious = 'true', ShowNext = 'true', PagedContentFile = $listUrl, ShowFirst = 'false', ShowLast = 'false' }") #end #else
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('full-list.vm')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.groupMembersList') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="Title" defaultValue="${resource:Groups_MembersList_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="viewType" labelResourceName="View" defaultValue="simple" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="simple" labelResourceName="View_Avatars" orderNumber="1000000" propertiesToShow="groupSelection,show,sortBy,sortOrder,pageSize,enablePaging" propertiesToHide="" /> <propertyValue value="simplelist" labelResourceName="View_Simple" orderNumber="1000001" propertiesToShow="groupSelection,show,sortBy,sortOrder,pageSize,enablePaging" propertiesToHide="" /> <propertyValue value="full" labelResourceName="View_Full" orderNumber="1000002" propertiesToHide="groupSelection,show,sortBy,sortOrder,pageSize,enablePaging" propertiesToShow="" /> </property> <property id="groupSelection" labelResourceName="Group" defaultValue="IncludeSubGroups=%20False&Group=0&GroupPath=" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_groupLookup" enableCurrent="true" /> <property id="show" labelResourceName="Show" defaultValue="owners" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="owners" labelResourceName="Show_Owners" orderNumber="1000000" propertiesToShow="" propertiesToHide="sortBy,sortOrder" /> <propertyValue value="all" labelResourceName="Show_All" orderNumber="1000001" propertiesToShow="sortBy,sortOrder" propertiesToHide="" /> </property> <property id="sortBy" labelResourceName="SortBy" defaultValue="Username" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="DisplayName" labelResourceName="SortBy_Username" /> <propertyValue value="GroupQualityAuthorScore" labelResourceName="SortBy_GroupQualityAuthorScore" /> </property> <property id="sortOrder" labelResourceName="SortOrder" defaultValue="Descending" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="Ascending" labelResourceName="SortOrder_Ascending" /> <propertyValue value="Descending" labelResourceName="SortOrder_Descending" /> </property> <property id="pageSize" labelResourceName="PageSize" defaultValue="20" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> <property id="enablePaging" labelResourceName="EnablePaging" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="EnablePaging">Enable Paging</resource> <resource name="Filter_AllMemberTypes">All member types</resource> <resource name="Filter_Managers">Managers</resource> <resource name="Filter_Members">Members</resource> <resource name="Filter_Owners">Owners</resource> <resource name="Group">Select group to pull from</resource> <resource name="Groups_Membership_NoMembers">This group currently has no members.</resource> <resource name="Groups_Membership_NoMembers_WithCriteria">No members were found matching your criteria.</resource> <resource name="Groups_MembersList_Description">Displays a list of group members</resource> <resource name="Groups_MembersList_Name">Group - Members List</resource> <resource name="manager">Manager</resource> <resource name="member">Member</resource> <resource name="members_filter">Search members...</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="owner">Owner</resource> <resource name="PageSize">Number of items to display</resource> <resource name="Show">Show</resource> <resource name="Show_All">All Group Members</resource> <resource name="Show_Owners">Group Owners Only</resource> <resource name="SortBy">Sort By</resource> <resource name="SortBy_GroupQualityAuthorScore">Group Author Quality Score</resource> <resource name="SortBy_MembershipDate">Group Joined Date</resource> <resource name="SortBy_Username">User Name</resource> <resource name="SortOrder">Sort Order</resource> <resource name="SortOrder_Ascending">Ascending</resource> <resource name="SortOrder_Descending">Descending</resource> <resource name="Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="View">View Type</resource> <resource name="View_Avatars">Avatar list</resource> <resource name="View_Full">Thumbnails with filters and search</resource> <resource name="View_Simple">Simple list</resource> </language>
